sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for the operation of Octagonal Blender for gentle and efficient blending of pharmaceutical powders and granules.
sections.scope: Applicable to powder blending activities carried out in the Pharmaceutics.
procedure: Ensure the blender is installed on a stable foundation with proper leveling.
Verify that the blending vessel is clean, dry, and free from previous material.
Check safety guards, interlocks, and emergency stop functionality.
Weigh all ingredients accurately as per batch formula.
Open the charging port and load ingredients (fill to 50-60% capacity).
Close the charging port securely and engage safety interlocks.
Set blending speed (typically 5-15 rpm) and blending time.
Start the blender and monitor rotation for smooth operation.
After completion, stop the motor and allow the vessel to come to rest.
Position for discharge, open the valve, and collect blended material.
Take samples for uniformity testing as per sampling plan.
Clean the blender interior thoroughly after use.
Document all blending parameters and observations in the BMR.
precautions: Do not exceed recommended load capacity for effective blending.
Ensure all ports are tightly sealed before starting rotation.
Never bypass safety interlocks or open guards during operation.
Verify blend uniformity through validated sampling techniques.
Clean thoroughly between different products to prevent cross-contamination.
